data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Famagusta.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Famagusta, Cyprus

data.prayer: Father, convict the 625 believers in Famagusta to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 78 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Famagusta, Cyprus. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Famagusta, Cyprus a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Persian people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Jesus, make the 34,541 people in the state of Famagusta who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.prayer: Over 28.09 percent of the people of Famagusta are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.section_summary:
the state of Famagusta, Cyprus has a population of 48,900.

We estimate Famagusta has 625 people who might know Jesus, 34,541 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 13,734 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 78 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Famagusta.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.
